page.title: 03LANGOLD LAKE
page.content: Langold Lake is between Langold and Carlton-in-Lindrick.It is the only ammenity in our block.The lake is approximately{25 metres deep at the deepest point.Langold Lake also has a diving board in the middle of it.Langold Lake is a{romantic place. Langold Lake is about 3 quarters of a mile long.It is owned by{Bassetlaw {council but it is in the district of {Nottinghamshire.}Langold Lake is mostly surrounded by trees and a large park.It has one{Adventure park}and a playing field.You can also{fish}and {water ski}in the lake.It is dangerous to swim in because it is full of weeds.Langold Lake is not a {natural lake.A man called{Sir Henry Galley- {Knight}was going to build a house by the side of the lake but his wife left him so he stopped building the house.
